Uses of Class
org.restlet.ext.jetty.JettyServerHelper

Packages that use JettyServerHelper
org.restlet.ext.jetty Integration with Jetty 7.1 which is a new implementation of the popular Jetty HTTP server able to leverage NIO. 
 

Uses of JettyServerHelper in org.restlet.ext.jetty

          Jetty AJP server connector.
 class HttpServerHelper
          Jetty HTTP server connector.
